title: Markdown to JIRA
name: markdown_to_jira
description: A right click menu entry to automatically convert Markdown syntax in JIRA's Markup (and the other way around).
author: Paolo Antinori

preferences.name: domains
preferences.title: Enabled domains
preferences.description: Edit the default value accordingly to your needs. Use | as a separator and * as a wildcard. Restart browser to enable new settings. Ex: *.apache.org|*.jira.com
